lead_paragraph: President Park Geun-hye fired eight aides on Sunday amid rising public anger over accusations that a private citizen was given undue influence in matters of policy.

headline.print_headline: South Korea Leader Fires Aides in Uproar
headline.main: South Korean President Dismisses Aides in Bid to Stem Worsening Scandal

snippet: President Park Geun-hye fired eight aides on Sunday amid rising public anger over accusations that a private citizen was given undue influence in matters of policy....
